comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: B-25Js of the 500th Bomb Squadron, 345th BG, sometime between October 1944 and March 1945. This is determined by the ship in the lead element flying the left wing position - "033." B-25J serial 43-36033 served with the unit from 1 October '44 to 24 February '45, when she was transferred to the 42nd BG...
